alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 12:27PM MST until May 14 at 12:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST FOR A PORTION OF APACHE AND NAVAJO COUNTIES... At 1227 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Show Low, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Pinetop-lakeside, Lake Of The Woods--Pinetop-lakeside, Wagon Wheel, Pinetop Country Club, Scott Reservoir Campground, Fool Hollow Lake Campground, White Mountain Lake and Lakeside Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 335 and 356. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 348. Highway 60 between mile markers 337 and 349. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
